name: #eggboythegame
description:
Use a physics based control system to throw eggs at a bigot in a challenging ten level game with no saves, can you get to the end?

#eggboy
#Eggboythegame

Music Jules Massenet: Orchestral Suite No. 5 'Scènes Napolitaines, La Danse
